rules_text:
Scry 2, then create a Treasure token.
Monument {2}{R} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: {2}, Sacrifice a creature or artifact: Hadak's Guardian deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text2:
[i]“The great dragon Hadak brawled with Golna for days, only to be laid low by the Shah and left bruised in scale and in ego.”
[/i]—The Tale of Kings[i][/i]
